Label: Total Gross Fixed Assets
Formula: land_and_buildings + construction_in_progress + capital_work_in_progress + property_plant_and_equipment + vehicles + leased_assets + other_fixed_assets

Label: Investment in Group and Related Cos
Loans to Group and Related Cos greater than 1 year
Other financial Assets at FVOCI / FVTPL / Amortised Cost
Total Non-Current Assets
Formula: total_net_fixed_assets + total_net_intangible_assets + financial_lease_receivables + notes_receivable + long_term_trade_debtors + long_term_other_debtors + long_term_prepayments + long_term_tax_recoverable + deferred_tax_asset + available_for_sale_investments + investment_in_group_and_related_cos + investment_in_a_joint_venture + investment_in_associates + investment_in_subsidiaries + loans_to_group_and_related_cos_greater_than_1_year + other_financial_assets_at_fvoci_fvtpl_amortised_cost + long_term_deposits + other_operating_non_current_assets + other_non_current_assets + other_non_operating_non_current_assets + deferred_charges

Label: Due from Group and Related Cos less than 1 year
Loans to Group and Related Cos less than 1 Year
Other Current Assets
Formula: goods_in_transit + due_from_group_and_related_cos_less_than_1_year + loans_to_group_and_related_cos_less_than_1_year + due_from_employees + due_from_government + other_debtors + tax_recoverable + prepaid_expenses + contract_assets + current_tax_assets + accounts_receivable_and_prepayments + other_operating_current_assets + other_non_operating_current_assets

Label: Due to Group and Related Cos less than 1 year
Loans from Group and Related Cos less than 1 Year
Deferred Income and gains - current portion
HP Leasing Other greater than 1 year
Loans from Group and Related Cos greater than 1 year
Accumulated Change in Fair Value of Fin. Assets
Equity Attributable To Owners of Parent
Total Capital and Reserves and Surplus
Formula: equity + minority_interest + capital_redemption_reserve + treasury_stock + general_reserve + reserves_and_surplus
